assignment.name: Basic Concepts : 5) Input / Area of a Square

files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Ask the human for input and store their response in a variable
sideLength = input( "Enter the side length:" )
# Convert the variable to a float data type
sideLength = float( sideLength )
# Calculate the area of a square with the side length, and store the result in a variable
area = (sideLength * sideLength )
# Display the summary text
print("A square with side length", sideLength, "has an area of", area )
